item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Recogni 推出新计算方法，以降低成本和电力需求
item.description: 人工智能芯片和软件初创公司Recogni周二发布了一种新型计算方法，可使其用于训练和运行人工智能系统的芯片体积更小、速度更快、运行成本更低。【原文：AI chip and software startup Recogni unveiled a novel computing method on Tuesday that could make its chips used to train and run artificial intelligence systems smaller, faster and less expensive to operate.】

item.title: Stellantis 证实贝尔维迪尔投资计划推迟
item.description: 斯泰兰特周二证实，它已通知美国汽车工人联合会（UAW），其在伊利诺伊州贝尔维迪尔的投资计划将被推迟，但该汽车制造商并未取消计划中的支出。【原文：Stellantis on Tuesday confirmed it had notified the United Auto Workers (UAW) union that its plans for investments at Belvidere, Illinois, will be delayed but the automaker is not scrapping the planned outlay.】

item.title: 尼尔森报告：受奥运会影响，7 月份美国流媒体收视率激增
item.description: 据研究公司尼尔森（Nielsen）最新发布的《The Gauge》报告显示，主要受巴黎夏季奥运会的影响，美国 7 月份的电视收视率比去年同期增长了 3.5%。【原文：TV viewership in the United States rose 3.5% in July from a year earlier, largely driven by the summer Olympics in Paris, according to research firm Nielsen's latest The Gauge report.】

item.title: 莫斯科证券交易所考虑对美国和英国制裁采取法律行动
item.description: 莫斯科证券交易所的游说团体周二表示，该交易所正在讨论如何挑战美国和英国实施的制裁，这些制裁导致交易所停止了美元和欧元交易，并冻结了交易的外国资产。【原文：The Moscow Stock Exchange is discussing ways to challenge sanctions imposed by the United States and Britain that led to a halt in exchange trading of dollars and euros and a freeze on traded foreign assets, its lobby group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国竞争监管机构接受 Meta 对广告数据规则的修改
item.description: 英国竞争监督机构周二表示，已接受 Meta 对其在全球社交媒体平台上广告客户数据使用方式的修改建议。【原文：Britain's competition watchdog said on Tuesday it has accepted Meta's proposed changes in the way it would use the data of customers choosing to advertise on the global social media platform.】

item.title: J&J 拟以最高 11 亿美元收购医疗器械制造商 V-Wave
item.description: 强生公司周二表示，将以不超过 11 亿美元的价格收购医疗设备制造商 V-Wave，这是该公司一系列收购行动中的最新一笔，目的是在其大片药物 Stelara 失去专利保护后推动增长。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Tuesday it would buy medical device maker V-Wave for up to $1.1 billion, the latest in a string of acquisitions aimed at driving growth once its blockbuster drug Stelara loses patent protection.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中信、中金公司等 10 家券商被纳入中国大湾区财富计划
item.description: 两位直接知情人士告诉路透社，中国和香港将扩大允许居民跨境投资的财富试点计划，首批增加 10 家证券公司，其中包括两国最大的券商。【原文：China and Hong Kong are set to expand a pilot wealth scheme that allows residents to invest cross-border by adding the first batch of 10 securities firms, including the countries' largest brokerages, two people with direct knowledge told Reuters.】

item.title: 美敦力因医疗器械需求和新产品上市上调盈利预期
item.description: 美敦力（Medtronic）周二小幅上调了其年度利润预期的下限，原因是对其医疗器械的持续需求以及新产品的增长。【原文：Medtronic slightly lifted the lower end of its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, banking on sustained demand for its medical devices and growth from its new launches.】

item.title: 由于竞争激烈，XPeng 预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 中国企业新鹏汽车周二预计，第三季度营收低于分析师预期，6月份的销售额也不及预期。【原文：Chinese firm XPeng , forecast third-quarter revenue below analysts' expectations and missed June-quarter sales estimates on Tuesday, hurt by stiff competition and a drop in demand for its aging line-up of pricey electric vehicles.】

item.title: 托管巨头道富通过新合作拓展加密货币服务
item.description: 这家美国金融服务提供商告诉路透社，国泰君安正在与瑞士加密货币公司 Taurus 合作，提供新的数字资产服务，包括将现实世界的资产转化为可交易的代币，以满足机构对此类投资日益增长的需求。【原文：State Street is partnering with Swiss crypto company Taurus to offer new digital asset services, including turning real-world assets into tradeable tokens, to tap growing institutional demand for such investments, the U.S. financial services provider told Reuters.】

item.title: 劳氏公司下调年度预期，原因是家装需求疲软
item.description: 本周二，劳氏公司（Lowe's）下调了年度利润和可比销售额预期，因为面对谨慎的消费者支出，大宗家居装修项目的复苏希望变得渺茫。【原文：Lowe's lowered its annual profit and comparable sales forecasts on Tuesday, as hopes of a recovery in big-ticket home improvement projects turn dim in the face of cautious consumer spending.】

item.title: 欧盟将对特斯拉中国产电动汽车的关税计划降至 9
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二削减了对进口中国制造的特斯拉汽车征收关税的提议，同时大体上维持了 7 月份对中国制造的电动汽车征收惩罚性关税的其他计划。【原文：The European Commission cut on Tuesday its proposed tariff on imports of Tesla cars built in China, as it broadly maintained other planned punitive duties it set in July on Chinese-made electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美联储官员准备参加杰克逊霍尔会议时对就业市场感到不安
item.description: 本周在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）举行的中央银行年会上，美联储官员可以对美国失业率（4.3%）保持在历史较低水平感到满意。【原文：Federal Reserve officials gathering at the annual central banking conference in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, this week can take some satisfaction that the U.S. unemployment rate, at 4.3%, remains low by historical standards.】

item.title: 由 JD Vance 共同创建的技术捐赠网络寻求将美国推向右翼
item.description: 根据此前未曾报道过的有关该组织的文件，在 JD-万斯开始迅速晋升为副总统候选人之前，他与他人共同创建了一个由硅谷支持的捐助组织，为右翼新闻报道、选民投票行动和选举民意调查提供资金，目的是传播美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的民族主义品牌。【原文：Before JD Vance began his rapid rise to vice presidential candidate, he co-founded a Silicon Valley-backed donor organization to finance right-wing news stories, voter turnout operations and election polls with a goal of spreading U.S. President Donald Trump’s brand of nationalism, according to previously unreported documents on the group.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，赫斯-圭亚那的秘密价值成为埃克森仲裁的一部分
item.description: 四位熟知内情的人士称，将对埃克森美孚和雪佛龙之间备受瞩目的冲突做出裁决的仲裁小组将深入研究赫斯公司在圭亚那的石油财富的秘密价值。【原文：An arbitration panel that will decide a high-profile clash between Exxon Mobil and Chevron will delve into the secret value of Hess' oil riches in Guyana, four people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国西海岸炼油厂仍在等待 TMX 提高利润率
item.description: 据在美国西海岸运营的公司称，加拿大扩建的跨山（TMX）石油管道已于 5 月份开始商业运营，但迄今为止对美国西海岸炼油厂的原油成本影响甚微。【原文：Canada's expanded Trans Mountain (TMX) oil pipeline, which commenced commercial operations in May, so far has had little impact on crude costs at refineries on the U.S. West Coast, according to companies operating there.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数猎云
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲地区金融和市场突发新闻记者 Alun John 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John, EMEA breaking news correspondent, finance and markets.】

item.title: 独家：印度反垄断机构警告迪士尼和信实媒体合并将伤害竞争对手--消息人士
item.description: 四位消息人士周二告诉路透社，印度反垄断机构已初步评估认为，Reliance 和华特迪士尼媒体资产 85 亿美元的印度合并案损害了竞争，原因是它们在板球转播权方面的权力。【原文：India's antitrust body has reached an initial assessment that the $8.5 billion India merger of Reliance and Walt Disney media assets harms competition due to their power over cricket broadcast rights, four sources told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 标普延续连胜势头，期指持稳；等待美联储提示
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货在区间震荡中走高，因为在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔本周晚些时候在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）发表讲话之前，市场对 9 月份降息的押注有所增强。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched higher in range-bound trading on Tuesday as bets of a September interest rate cut solidified ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech at Jackson Hole later this week.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，MSCI 将阿根廷重新分类可能引发 10 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）周二表示，如果指数提供商摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）可能将阿根廷提升至新兴市场地位，那么将有近 10 亿美元的投资者资金涌入该国股市。【原文：A potential upgrade for Argentina to emerging market status from index provider MSCI could see nearly $1 billion in investor money pour into the country's stocks, JPMorgan said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：汇丰考虑出售南非业务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，汇丰控股目前正在探讨出售其南非业务，因为这家曾经遍布全球的公司正继续将重心转向亚洲。【原文：HSBC Holdings is currently exploring a sale of its South Africa businesses, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, as the once globe-spanning company continues to move its focus towards Asia.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称宝马因短路问题召回逾 72 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，宝马公司因短路问题召回了 720,796 辆美国汽车。【原文：BMW is recalling 720,796 U.S. vehicles over concerns of a short circuit, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大化肥公司称铁路停运将导致化肥行业每天损失高达 6,300 万美元
item.description: 加拿大化肥公司（Fertilizer Canada）周二警告说，影响全国所有铁路服务的中断将使化肥行业每天损失约 5500 万至 6300 万美元的销售收入，这还不包括物流和运营成本。【原文：Fertilizer Canada warned on Tuesday disruptions impacting all rail services across the country will cost the fertilizer industry an estimated $55 million to $63 million per day in lost sales revenue, not including logistical and operational costs.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的视频游戏《黑色神话：悟空传》首测玩家人数创新高
item.description: 由腾讯支持的一家初创公司周二推出的一款新视频游戏迅速成为主要在线平台上玩家最多的游戏，凸显了人们对中国开发的游戏日益增长的兴趣。【原文：A new video game title launched on Tuesday by a Tencent-backed startup has quickly become the most-played game on a major online platform, highlighting growing interest in Chinese-developed titles.】

item.title: 电池制造商 Northvolt 将研发中心从加利福尼亚迁至瑞典
item.description: 电池制造商 Northvolt 周二表示，公司将整合锂金属电池技术的开发，并将其从加利福尼亚州转移到位于瑞典瓦斯塔斯的研发中心。【原文：Battery maker Northvolt will consolidate and shift development of lithium-metal battery technology to its R&D hub in Vasteras, Sweden, from California, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贸易机构称，在中国禁令之后，日本希望促进海产品出口到新市场
item.description: 日本贸易振兴机构（Japan External Trade Organization）负责人表示，日本正在加大宣传力度，促进海产品出口到亚洲、美国和欧洲的更多目的地，以填补长达一年的中国进口禁令所留下的销售空白。【原文：Japan is ramping up promotional efforts to boost seafood exports to more destinations in Asia, the U.S., and Europe as it seeks to fill a sales gap left by a year-long Chinese import ban, the head of the Japan External Trade Organization said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，沙特基金希望为新货运航空公司引进波音和空客喷气机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金正在洽谈为一家新的货运航空公司采购波音 777 和空客 350 飞机。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund is in talks to procure jets from Boeing 777 and Airbus 350 for a new cargo airline, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国司法部审查期结束后，阿拉斯加航空与夏威夷航空的合并继续推进
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）周一晚些时候表示，美国司法部（DOJ）完成与夏威夷航空公司（Hawaiian Airlines）拟议合并监管调查的期限已过。【原文：Alaska Airlines said late on Monday that the time period for the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) to complete its regulatory investigation of the proposed combination with Hawaiian Airlines has expired.】

item.title: 迪斯尼同意佛罗里达州法院对过失致人死亡诉讼做出判决
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司周一同意由法院就佛罗里达州一位鳏夫提起的过失致死诉讼作出裁决，此前该公司曾辩称，由于该男子在 2019 年注册试用了流媒体服务 Disney+，因此该案应提交仲裁。【原文：Walt Disney Co on Monday agreed to have a court decide on a wrongful death lawsuit, brought by a widower in Florida, after earlier arguing the case belonged in arbitration because the man signed up for a trial of streaming service Disney+ in 2019.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示，韩国央行周四将维持现状，10 月份将首次降息
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，韩国央行周四将把主要利率维持在 3.50%，并在美国联邦储备委员会可能于 9 月份开始宽松政策后于下一季度下调利率。【原文：The Bank of Korea will keep its key interest rate at 3.50% on Thursday and cut it next quarter after the U.S. Federal Reserve likely begins easing in September, according to a Reuters poll.】
